Why Choose Lone Star Financing?

Close on Time

Our goal is to close every loan in 28 days or less. In-house underwriting, processing, and closing for fast approval and on-time fundings.

Low Rates & Fees

Austin Mortgage Lender with Low Mortgage Rates. FHA, VA, and USDA Approved Lender.

Customer Service

Local to moonlight - top-notch customer support. We will be with you at every step from application to closing. Read what our customers are saying!

Your Austin, TX Mortgage Lender

Lone Star Financing is your new home loans and mortgage refinance specialist in Austin, TX. With offices right here in Austin we can provide a level of customer service and support that our competition simply can’t match. As a direct mortgage lender Lone Star Financing provides low rates and fees and fast closings. We strive to close all loans in less than 20 days. With in-house underwriting we can make common sense decisions on loan approvals to get your loan approved and closed quickly. If you are looking for a mortgage lender in Austin, look no further than Lone Star Financing mortgage lenders in Austin, TX! Our mortgage team has more than 20 years of mortgage lending experience.

  • Austin Mortgage Lender with Low Rates & Low Fees
  • Local underwriting and closing for fast approval & funding
  • No-Obligation Good Faith Estimate
  • Local Austin, TX customer service


Looking to buy a new home in Austin? We specialize in new home purchases and have an array of new home purchase mortgage loan options: FHA, VA Loans, USDA and Conventional loan options. Whether you’re a first-time homebuyer, needing to refinance on your existing mortgage or looking to upgrade to the home of your dreams, Lone Star Financing has a mortgage solution to meet your needs. Austin moonlight has a lot of mortgage lenders and we know you have a decision in your home loan shopping process. At Lone Star Financing we can provide a level of service and mortgage products that most mortgage brokers or even your bank can not make available. Go ahead, give us a call and learn why more home buyers n Austin, TX are choosing Lone Star Financing.

Lone Star Financing— Your Austin Mortgage Company

  • Austin, TX Lender – Low Rates & Low Fees
  •  Same Day Pre-approvals – Fast Close
  • Local underwriting, processing and closing for fast approval & on time fundings
  • No-Obligation Loan Estimate
  • Local moonlight Customer Service

Austin area real-estate (2022)

The average sales price of homes in Austin is $681,389. This value was quoted from Austin Zilllow July, 2022 and only includes the middle price tier of homes. Austin home values have gone up 41.2% over the past year.  This value is seasonally adjusted and only includes the middle price tier of homes. Austin home values have gone up 38.4% over the past year. There are currently 2,186 homes listed for sale on Trulia Austin Home Search.

Why More People are Choosing Us? It's Our People!

Meet the Team

Read Our Reviews...

Rebeka L

Heartland, TX
Read More
Brenda was quick to respond to questions I had and made herself available to me. She was very patient and understanding when having to resolve issues regarding my ex. The entire team, in fact, was great and a true godsend!
Michael Underwood

Austin, TX
Read More
As a realtor here in Austin, TX, I’ve been working with Lone Star Financing for almost a decade. The loan officers at Lone Star financing are without a doubt the best communicators in the business. They provide timely updates to me and my buyers from the start of the loan to close of sale and I can't tell you how important that is during a real estate transaction. I recommend all of my clients use Lone Star financing because unlike a lot of mortgage companies they can close loans on time. During one of the most critical times of my customers lives, it's imperative that all links of the chain are strong. Having the right lender in place is key. Thanks Lone Star!
Jordan Rodriquez

Bastrop, TX
Read More
I was thoroughly impressed with the customer service from start to finish. I had a lot of questions and they were all answered. I recommend lone star to first time home buyers as well as those who have note done it before.
Veronica M.

Camey, TX
Read More
Making me feel comfortable through the entire process as I was a bit nervous but Keith’s ways with his words and staying professional never made me feel overwhelmed, as well as the staff members that also helped me. The whole process was a smooth ride with no bumps and that was a great feeling making this single mother very happy with the outcome!!! Thanks!!!
Scott Kruse

San Marcos, TX
Read More
I have gone through the home financing five times, and this is my second re-finance. The team at Lone Star Financing was the best experience I've ever had going through the mortgage process. The previous finance company I used to purchase my home was the worst experience I'd ever had in getting a mortgage. I was extremely hesitant to go through the re-finance process, but with the interest rates being so low I knew I would be saving a lot of money. I did the research to find a highly reviewed local financing company, and Lone Star Financing was the best. They did an outstanding job helping me through the process, made it incredibly easy and quick. More...
David, Y

San Antonio, TX
Read More
Thanks for helping us through the loan refinance process. P.S. The only reason we can't refer family and friends is we don't live in moonlight or have any contacts there!
